title: Tata Motors opens fifth registered vehicle scrapping facility
description: "The launch of our fifth scrapping facility marks a significant step forward in making sustainable practices and responsible vehicle disposal more accessible. Creating value from scrap aligns with our vision of a building a circular economy," Tata Motors Executive Director Girish Wagh said.
